name.ja: <ruby>双<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>焔<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby>アルシェル

requirement.en: If you have a FIRE Attribute Maximum Monster in your Graveyard, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card gains ATK equal to [the number of FIRE Attribute Maximum Monsters in your Graveyard] x 300 until the end of this turn. Then, if you have 3 or more Maximum Monsters in your Graveyard, this card inflicts piercing battle damage this turn.

ritual_spell: Altar of the Twin Blaze Fiends
